bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Etiological Agent. of tan 痰 , phlegm, and shui 水 , water, jointly bringing forth disease. Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry zhu 术：消痰水，逐皮間風水結腫 , “It dissolves phlegm and water , and it dispels wind and water from the skin, forming nodes and swelling”.

② Illness Sign of vomiting and defecation of matter that resembles phlegm and water. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Shen nong ben jing ming li 神農本經名例：以十棗湯一服，下痰水 數升 , “With one dosage of the ‘decoction with ten jujubes’, one can discharge several sheng of rheumy liquid ”.
